text.0_Letter, 1_Entry: א- Often used to form second roots of verbs, ע"ע [geminate], e.g. טמם, אטם.
text.0_Letter, 0_Entry: א-Aleph, the first letter of the alphabet, interchanging with other gutturals, e. g. אבב, הבב, חבב, עבב; אליתא, עליתא &c....
text.0_Letter, 2_Entry: א- Frequent prosthetic, e. g. גודל, אגודל. See -אִ.
